challenges.title: Install Docker Engine
challenges.description: Install Docker Engine on your Linux system and verify that it works correctly.

challenges.title: Run Your First Container
challenges.description: Run the hello-world container and confirm it executes successfully.

challenges.title: List Running Containers
challenges.description: Start an nginx container in detached mode and verify it appears in the running containers list.

challenges.title: Stop and Remove a Container
challenges.description: Stop a running nginx container and remove it from your system.

challenges.title: Pull an Image Manually
challenges.description: Pull the alpine image from Docker Hub and verify it exists locally.

challenges.title: Run a Container with Port Mapping
challenges.description: Run an nginx container mapping port 8080 on your host to port 80 inside the container.

challenges.title: Create a Dockerfile
challenges.description: Create a simple Dockerfile that uses alpine and prints a custom message.

challenges.title: Build a Custom Image
challenges.description: Build a Docker image from your Dockerfile and verify it appears in the image list.

challenges.title: Run Container with Volume Mount
challenges.description: Run a container that mounts a local folder into the container and verify the mount works.

challenges.title: Inspect a Container
challenges.description: Use docker inspect to retrieve detailed information about a running container.
